Title: My Father's Crossbow
Description:
I came here to visit my dad at the temple. As soon as I got here, I saw the most terrifying thing I've ever seen.

It was a mantid, walking right past me, carrying my father's crossbow.

Something's happened to my dad! We've got to find out what it is... but first, we'll need his crossbow back. I saw him heading west, behind the temple.
RewardText:
Yeah, this is dad's.

Let's head on over to the temple. They'll know what...

<Ku-Mo's voice catches.>

...what happened to him.
